name: Baldi's in Viktor school tour (Baldi's basic custom map)
name_original: Baldi's in Viktor school tour (Baldi's basic custom map)
description:
Today Baldi brought us to the Viktor school and now you're here to tour around the place while collecting the notebooks and meet some new friends. Now go and meet some new friends in this Viktor school.

Note: This is the V1 of the game. It contains only 1 level for now. There will be more stuff in the future.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map creator

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

MrDrNose - The creator of AEWVS
